title: Deutsche Bank to host 12th Women in Banking & Finance (WiBF) Annual Forum in Sydney
body:
On Tuesday 27 October, Deutsche Bank will host the 12th Women in Banking & Finance’s (WiBF) Annual Forum in Sydney. This year’s event – A fresh perspective - brings together three leaders in very different fields to share their personal and professional insights into the value of taking a different approach as individuals, in workplaces and as a society.
Panel
Susan Lloyd-Hurwitz, Chief Executive Officer and Managing Director, Mirvac
Gigi Foster, Professor, Director of Education, School of Economics, UNSW
Shaun Bonétt, Precision Group Founder, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer
Moderator
Adam Spencer, Commentator, polymath and author
Tuesday 27 October 2020
4:50pm – 5:55pm (AEDT)
This virtual event will be livestreamed from the ausbiz studios at Barangaroo in Sydney
Deutsche Bank is a Diamond Member of Women in Banking and Finance, an established not-for-profit making a tangible impact in addressing gender diversity in the financial services sector in Australia. Deutsche Bank has hosted the WiBF Annual Forum since its launch in 2009 as an important part of our global commitment to diversity and inclusion.
